title: got kick out of a ranked game
body: ok so i was playing ziggs mid got disconnected from league then bam im in end game lobby but my game is still going. has this happened to other people?

replies.body: I've had it do that recently on a server maint on NA, when they disable ranked queue. That's it though.
Did you disconnect towards the end of a game? It tends to glitch out if that happens (or so I have heard). Just wait a bit and it should fix itself.
nah like we had a team fight about20 min in and bam game like shut down
